lu.softec.maven.mavenizer.mavenfile.internal
Class DefaultMavenFileFactory

java.lang.Object
  lu.softec.maven.mavenizer.mavenfile.internal.DefaultMavenFileFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
MavenFileFactory
public class DefaultMavenFileFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements MavenFileFactory

Default implementation of the MavenFileFactory interface. This implementation is a singleton and keep hard references to all created instances of MavenFile. It ensure only one MavenFile instance is created for a given File, and that any subsequent request matches the initially created instance.

                       throws InvalidMavenCoordinatesException,

                              org.apache.maven.artifact.resolver.ArtifactNotFoundException
Description copied from interface: MavenFileFactory
Associate a File with its Maven coordinates and dependencies

Specified by:
getMavenFile in interface MavenFileFactory
Parameters:
libfile - the File
groupId - the groupId for this file
artifactId - the artifactId for this file
version - the version for this file
classifier - the classifier for this file. May be null.
deps - the dependencies of this file.
repository - local repository to look for missing artifacts
Returns:
a MavenFile associating the File with the above coordinates and dependencies.
Throws:
InvalidMavenCoordinatesException - when a MavenFile with an invalid set of coordinate would have been created
org.apache.maven.artifact.resolver.ArtifactResolutionException
org.apache.maven.artifact.resolver.ArtifactNotFoundException
